attributes.action: Evaluate the possibility of re-building the spires on top of the Lincoln Cathedral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Lincoln Cathedral was once one of the most impressive structures in the world, despite the loss of the spires on the structure the Cathedral is regarded as a masterpiece of engineering standing the test of time.

By evaluating the possibility to re-build or construct new spires on this cathedral, it would raise the profile of the cathedral, the city and the united kingdom by not only showing respect to ancestors architecture but by making it one of the most tallest religious structures in europe once again.

rejection.details: This would be an issue for the Anglican Church.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
